attributes.additional_details: my xl bully would never bite anyone or go for anyone he’s to lazy he’s to big to even run that far without getting out of breathe he’s a great family pet and alot of xl bully owners would agree. The dogs that have done this recently is awful for who’s been involved but it’s not the breed itself it’s the owners of them,Banning a breed which a lot of people own I don’t feel is fair it is down to owners they should be punished not everyone else with a dog they know wouldn’t switch.
attributes.background: I want them to re consider this,it shouldn’t have to be your dog being taken from you if your out on a walk or somewhere and breaking family’s hearts not long ago it was staffys that you were trying to ban, Rottweilers, dobermans the list goes on. We shouldn’t all have to be punished.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
